title: Can u get unchained alistar on oce ??
body: my friend said that he got unchained alistar for the oce sever is it possible or is he just lying ??? could u ples help me ?

replies.body:
YouTube is the Dreadknight Garen Skin!


I shall forever treasure my "King Rammus" and "UFO Corki" skins!

Liking the American/Oceanic Facebook Pages: Riot Tristana
Following the American Twitter Page: Unchained Alistar
Subscribing to the American YouTube Page: Dreadknight Garen

Unfornutely, Unless you switch to the NA Servers and like their pages there or talk to Oceanic Support you wont be able to get the Alistar Skin.

[Like this page to get Riot Tristana](https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsOceania), [follow this page to get Unchained Alistar](https://twitter.com/LOL_Oceania) and [um I forgot the Youtube one](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc).

Hi Skronix Legend,

Unchained Alistar is usually given out for subscribing to the Riot Games youtube channel.   Unfortunately that system is not active for Oceania.

You could get in touch with the support team and explain the situation - they might be able to help you out.

Cheers,
Mindstar
